item.arma_futuri.light_combat_helmet.des:
A light yet durable helmet made using titanium based armor plates. Offers basic protection from blunt and sharp objects
Has a built-in flashlight.
item.arma_futuri.light_combat_chestplate: A light chestplate used by recon troops, made using titanium based armor plates. Has one expansion slot.
item.arma_futuri.light_combat_leggings.d: Lightly armored leggings with basic hydraulics allowing for slightly faster walking speed.
item.arma_futuri.light_combat_boots.desc: Light Reinforced boots with shock absorbers. They increase fall endurance of the user.
item.arma_futuri.jetpack.description:
A compact arrangement of jet engines and a small fuel tank that can be attached to a suitable piece of armor. Allows the user to propel themselves into the air.
[Jump] while in the air to fly
[Crouch] to slowly descent
item.arma_futuri.shield_module.descripti:
WIP. This should not be used in survival.
A compact shield generator that can be attached to a suitable piece of armor. protects the user from projectiles and explosions, but offers no protection from melee weapon hits.
item.arma_futuri.flashlight_upgrade.desc: Replaces the built-in flashlight doubling its range.
